alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:29AM CST until January 28 at 8:47AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Navidad River at Morales affecting Jackson and Lavaca Counties. For the Navidad River...including Sublime, Speaks, Morales, Strane Park...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navidad River at Morales. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Major lowland flooding begins with several feet of water over the approaches to the County Road 283 bridge and water threatending the bridge floor. The lowest homes in the flood plain are threatened near Vienna and in northern Jackson County. Livestock should be removed from the flood plain from the headwaters to Lake Texana. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 32.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.0 feet on 10/17/2007. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Navidad River Morales 29.0 26.5 Thu 10 am CS 32.2 31.1 21.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening.late tonight at 430 AM CST.
